title: Here’s When 'Final Fantasy' Maker Square Enix Is Dropping NFTs for its Ethereum Game
description: Symbiogenesis, an original Ethereum and Polygon game from Final Fantasy creator Square Enix, is set to launch in December.

title: Nine Chronicles M, on-chain MMORPG game, launches on mobile
description: Planetarium Labs, a web3 gaming company, has released its open-world fantasy game Nine Chronicles on mobile

title: XRP analyst sees potential bottom, urges caution
description: Crypto analyst CoinsKid claims to see a potential bottom in XRP but says more bullish structure is needed before he'll call the absolute bottom.

title: European Banking Authority proposes overhaul of AML, CFT rules for crypto providers
description: In a consultation paper released on Nov. 24, the European Banking Authority (EBA), an EU agency tasked with implementing a standard set of rules to regulate banking across all EU countries, highlights that existing regulations governing Anti-Money Laundering/Combating the Financing of Terrorism (AML/CFT) standards compliance for crypto providers are inadequate.

title: IOTA Identity 1.0 Unleashes a New Era of Digital Autonomy on Shimmer
description: IOTA has launched the latest version of its decentralized identity (DID) tool, IOTA Identity 1.0, incorporating the advancements from the Stardust protocol upgrade. The upgrade introduces Alias Outputs on Layer 1, enabling innovative interactions and expanding IOTA Identity’s capabilities. IOTA, the innovative blockchain network, has officially introduced the latest version of its decentralized identity (DID) [...]

title: Uphold To Set Up Initial $5B Liquidity in Partnership With Ripple
description:
Simon McLoughlin, CEO of Uphold, has said that his company’s role in the recently established partnership with Ripple is to function as a node in Ripple’s network of liquidity providers. McLoughlin explained that Uphold’s role would be to convert XRP to fiat for bank payouts. According to the Uphold CEO, Ripple’s primary solution is to […]

The post Uphold To Set Up Initial $5B Liquidity in Partnership With Ripple appeared first on Coin Edition.
